title: [Angargreft, Pits of the Dead]
description: The corridor opens into a wide cavern with a sinkhole full of sluggish, frothing blood at its heart.  It is fed by a steady drip of sanguine fluid from the rock ceiling, a jagged snarl of red-smeared stalactites and cragged stone.  Despite the frigid air, the blood hisses and steams, filling the air with a vile tang and strange humidity.
paths: Obvious exits: northeast, southeast, southwest, west
